DialogWorkflows.BroadView: A wide view of a conversation where the player attends a board meeting. It is too long to be displayed fully on one screen.
DialogWorkflows.Hub: This hub deals with choices tied to the game system of player traits.
DialogWorkflows.QuestProgression: The purple nodes are dependent on player Quest Progression.
DialogWorkflows.VarietyOfChoices: A variety of choices and results near the end of the conversation.
DialogWorkflows.VariableLogic: Nodes containing variable logic determine the conversation's possible outcomes.
